slug.description: Used for internal references (e.g. OIDC client ID).

name.description: Used for any public-facing or display contexts (e.g. the GitHub team name).

leads.description: The github usernames of the tech leads of the team.

devs.description: The github usernames of the developers of the team.

applicants.description: The github usernames of the applicants of the team.

ext-admins.description: External individuals who need admin access to the app (e.g. orientation staffs for O-Quest) but are not involved in development.

repos.description: The github repositories of the team, in the format of 'ScottyLabs/<repo-name>'.

slack-channel-ids.description: The Slack channel IDs of the team.
